com.google.enterprise.connector.spi
Interface ConnectorPersistentStore

public interface ConnectorPersistentStore

Gives connectors access to a local storage area.

Since:
2.8
See Also:
ConnectorPersistentStoreAware

Method Summary
 LocalDatabase getLocalDatabase()
          Gets a LocalDatabase through which the connector can create and alter private data.
 LocalDocumentStore getLocalDocumentStore()
          Gets a LocalDocumentStore through which the connector can access the Connector Manager's persisted store of document metadata.
 

Method Detail

getLocalDocumentStore

LocalDocumentStore getLocalDocumentStore()
Gets a LocalDocumentStore through which the connector can access the Connector Manager's persisted store of document metadata.

Returns:
a LocalDocumentStore or null for Connector Manager versions prior to 3.0

getLocalDatabase

LocalDatabase getLocalDatabase()
Gets a LocalDatabase through which the connector can create and alter private data.

Returns:
a LocalDatabase.
